data.name: Aqueduct
data.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

variations.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

data.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

data.name: Cistern
data.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +5/10/15/20/25% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura. Cistern costs increase the more Cisterns are built.

variations.name: Cistern
variations.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +5/10/15/20/25% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura. Cistern costs increase the more Cisterns are built.

data.name: Cistern of the First Hill
data.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 10 seconds.
Flasks refill every 45 seconds to a maximum of 10 active flasks.

variations.name: Cistern of the First Hill
variations.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 10 seconds.
Flasks refill every 45 seconds to a maximum of 10 active flasks.

data.name: Dock
data.description:
Produces naval units.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to three Fishing Ships.

variations.name: Dock
variations.description:

Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.

influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Hui Hui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.

data.name: Grand Winery
data.description:
Acts as a Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.
Villagers can drop off Food at this building.

data.name: Imperial Hippodrome
data.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 30 seconds. Earn more points by killing enemy units.

variations.name: Imperial Hippodrome
variations.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 30 seconds. Earn more points by killing enemy units.
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.

data.name: Mercenary House
data.description:
Produces Mercenary units for Olive Oil after purchasing a Mercenary Contract. One contract can be purchased.
Unlock another set of Mercenaries with +50% production speed by placing this building near a Trade Post.

data.name: Olive Grove
data.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Olive Grove.
Only one Villager can work each Olive Grove.
Byzantine Villagers gather Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered.

variations.description:
Harvestable Food source. Use a Villager to gather Food from the Olive Grove.
Only one Villager can work each Olive Grove.
Byzantine Villagers gather Olive Oil equal to 20% of Food gathered.
